https://tmrev.io/movie/788943-A Radiant Girl 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/280rEPBBhrWbA3wdvYILZ7RBYz0.jpg Paris, summer 1942. Irene is a young, bubbly, 19-year-old Jewish girl. Her family watches her discover the world, friends, new love and a passion for the theatre. The aspiring actress is living her youthful life without a care in the world, but she does not know that time may be running out. A Radiant Girl
